text.value: 1. Did you introduce yourself to your community leaders after you had completed training on the use of ICT tools in disease surveillance?

10. Have you ever experienced any disease outbreak in humans in your village over the past 12 months?
11. If yes to Qn. 10, could you describe the last outbreak (probe on average timelines if respondent cannot recall exactly)
11.2 Estimate of the number of cases
Damu kutoka puani/mdomoni/masikioni/machoni/sehemu za haja ndogo na kubwa
Kuvimba tezi maeneo ya shingo, makwapa, mapaja
Kutokwa na machozi/kuvimba macho/macho kuwa mekundu
Manjano kwenye sehemu nyeupe ya macho/ngozi
Ngozi ikiﬁnywa/ kubonyezwa inarudi polepole sana

11.5 No. of days between onset of outbreak and notification to higher level
11.6 No. days between outbreak onset and verification
11.7 No. days between outbreak onset and intervention
11.8 No. days between outbreak onset and outbreak end

17. After submitting a report on health events to a higher level, do you get a feedback
18. If yes in Qn. 17: how do you get feedback?
I. Provision of health care services
19. How many people have you referred to health facilities during the past 12 months using referral forms you were provided with?
20. How often do you use AfyaData?
21. J. Technical issues on the usage of AfyaData tools in the collection and submission of disease events report
21.1 How easy is it to use AfyaData app?
21.2 Is app working smoothly in your phone?
21.3 Have you ever used feedback feature to see if your report has been received?
21.4 Which features of AfyaData tools do you think they need to be improved?
Forms (Fill, Edit, Get, Sent, Delete, View)
Other features of AfyaData tools do you think they need to be improved
21.5 What have been the motivation for you to continue using AfyaData?
A requirement related to my duties
21.6 What challenges do you experience while using AfyaData? App
Signing in after accidentally sign out
22.1 What is your opinions regarding the usefulness of CHR-Specialist WhatsApp group in disease surveillance and clinical case management?
22.2 How often do you use the CHR-Specialist WhatsApp platform?
K. General skills on Technology and associated benefits
23. How do you rate your skills of using smartphones since you received training?
24. What kind of social value has Afyadata/smartphone added to you while working/living in your area
Helped other to use my phone for their communication
25. What have you seen as benefits and limitations while using electronic system (AfyaData) in the collection and submission of outbreak/disease reports in the community?
26. What would you recommend to improve use of AfyaData tools in recording and submitting health information in the community
